self:CScriptAdd("SettingTableRequested", function(requester) return TMW.CI.gs end)
self:SetTextFormatter(TMW.C.Formatter:New(UNIT_LEVEL_TEMPLATE), TMW.C.Formatter.PASS)

local stratas = { "BACKGROUND", "LOW", "MEDIUM", "HIGH", "DIALOG", "FULLSCREEN", "FULLSCREEN_DIALOG", "TOOLTIP", }
TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(TMW.L["UIPANEL_STRATA"], TMW.L["UIPANEL_STRATA_DESC"]) self:SetSetting("Strata")
self:SetMinMaxValues(1, #stratas) self:SetValueStep(1)
self:CScriptAdd("ModifySettingValueRequested", function(self, value) return stratas[value] end)
self:CScriptAdd("UnModifySettingValueRequested", function(self, value) return TMW.tContains(stratas, value) end)
self:CScriptAdd("SettingTableRequested", function(requester) return TMW.CI.gs end)
self:SetTextFormatter(TMW.C.Formatter:New(function(value) if value and stratas[value] then return TMW.L["STRATA_" .. stratas[value]] else return "" end end), TMW.C.Formatter.NONE)

TMW:CInit(self)
self:SetTexts(TMW.L["UIPANEL_SCALE"], nil) self:SetSetting("Scale")
self:SetMode(self.MODE_ADJUSTING) self:SetMinMaxValues(0.4, 30) self:SetRange(0.5) self:SetValueStep(0.0001) self:SetWheelStep(0.01)
self:SetTextFormatter(TMW.C.Formatter.PERCENT100, TMW.C.Formatter.PERCENT100_F0)
self:CScriptAddPre("SettingSaved", function() local group = TMW.CI.group
local GroupModule_GroupPosition = group:GetModuleOrModuleChild("GroupModule_GroupPosition") GroupModule_GroupPosition:SetNewScale(self:GetValue()) end)
self:CScriptAdd("SettingTableRequested", function(requester) return TMW.CI.gs end)

TMW:CInit(self)
